text: Ernest Kesler (, ; 31 July 1931) is a former professional Soviet football forward and coach. ==Notes== ==References == ==External links== * Category:1931 births Category:2004 deaths Category:People from Carpathian Ruthenia Category:Ukrainian people of Hungarian descent Category:Soviet people of Hungarian descent Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Soviet footballers Category:SKA Lviv players Category:FC Hoverla Uzhhorod players Category:Soviet football managers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:SKA Lviv managers Category:SC Lutsk managers Category:FC Hoverla Uzhhorod managers Category:Association football forwards
title: Ernest Kesler
